title: PBE
body:
I applied for the pbe (many times, sorry about that) but the first time was about maybe march-june.  sometime around then.  Im sorry to be impatient but I would really like to be a PBE tester.  I know nobody is going to see this but im just hoping eventually I could be accepted.  Please consider what im asking.

-Ethan

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we are unable to manually review PBE Applications. The application process is mostly a waiting game, since our criteria with how we select testers for each batch of invites changes a lot. What does remain consistent is that we're always on the lookout for *really active* players who are a **positive influence** on the community.

Check out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more details. Please let me know if you have any questions.
